thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: John
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by John

author: John
title: John
text:
After approaching Tom at Town Fair Tire in Hanover, MA about a problem tire on my daughter's Subaru that was no longer in stock. Tom was able to locate/ship the tire to the store so we could have it in time to send her back to college in her vehicle. He explained to me how he could relate to my situation having children of his own and he would get it done at a very reasonable price. He did!
Thank You Tom
